#scientist #leader_trait_adaptable_2 
xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_scientist_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_scientist_trigger = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_effect = yes }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_scientist_trigger = yes

    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_academic_dig_site_expert_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }

    }
}


#scientist #leader_trait_manufacturer_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_scientist_leader_trait_manufacturer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = { always = yes }
    allow = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_manufacturer_3 }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_requires_leader_subclass_trigger = { CLASS = scientist ID = subclass_scientist_governor }
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_picked_class_scientist_trigger = yes
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = scientist ID = leader_trait_manufacturer_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

        has_technology = tech_robotic_workers

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_leader_making_trait_count_points_costs_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
